questions.text: How satisfied are you with our service?

Task-Questions.text: Is there something you have been dreaming of for a long time? Why haven't you done it yet?
Which topics that concern you a lot currently would you like to talk about more often?
How do you deal with unpredictability and uncertainty in life?
What is so serious that you shouldn’t make jokes about?
What would you like to leave behind in this world?
What do you fall back to when you don’t know how to deal with difficult life situations?
Which thing could you learn from a difficult phase in your life?
What would you like to say to your younger self 10 years ago?
What was the last thing that you really got excited about?
Was there a personality (f.e. teachers, famous people, fictional characters) in your childhood or youth that had a particular influence on your further personal development?
Do you think that everyone has a purpose in life? Which is yours? Tell me about your favourite childhood memory.
Have you ever had an experience that made you change your mind about a topic that you thought would never change?
Can you remember an experience when you felt inner peace and connection to the world and nature? What was it?
Think of a problem that concerns you recently. Explain it to me like you would explain it to an alien.
